name: Safari 16.5
available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey
advisories.impact: Processing web content may disclose sensitive information
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey
advisories.impact: Processing web content may disclose sensitive information
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to break out of Web Content sandbox. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

cves.credit: Clément Lecigne of Google's Threat Analysis Group and Donncha Ó Cearbhaill of Amnesty International’s Security Lab

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey
advisories.impact: Processing web content may disclose sensitive information. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.
